languages.text: "Бойтесь {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости, друзья. Судя по легкости, с которой он{mf||а} согласил{mf|ся|ась}, я начинаю догадываться, откуда берутся бесчисленные богатства Вольного Торговца. Но предупреждаю — на Ифрите игра на деньги считается грехом, потому что игра — испытание судьбы. Мы будем играть на желания". {n}Несколько плиток ложится на стол перед вами и остальными игроками.{/n}

"Watch out for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, lads. {mf|He|She} was awfully quick to agree just now — I have a sneaking suspicion about how the Rogue Trader acquired all {mf|his|her} countless riches. But I'll warn you now — playing for money is considered wrong on Efreet, because gaming is tempting fate. So instead, we're going to play for wishes." {n}A pile of tiles is placed in front of you and the other players.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Бойтесь {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости, друзья. Судя по легкости, с которой он{mf||а} согласил{mf|ся|ась}, я начинаю догадываться, откуда берутся бесчисленные богатства Вольного Торговца. Но предупреждаю — на Ифрите игра на деньги считается грехом, потому что игра — испытание судьбы. Мы будем играть на желания". {n}Несколько плиток ложится на стол перед вами и остальными игроками.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Watch out for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, lads. {mf|He|She} was awfully quick to agree just now — I have a sneaking suspicion about how the Rogue Trader acquired all {mf|his|her} countless riches. But I'll warn you now — playing for money is considered a sin on Efreet, because gaming is tempting fate. So instead, we're going to play for wishes." {n}A pile of tiles is placed in front of you and the other players.{/n}

"Watch out for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, lads. {mf|He|She} was awfully quick to agree just now — I have a sneaking suspicion about how the Rogue Trader acquired all {mf|his|her} countless riches. But I'll warn you now — playing for money is considered wrong on Efreet, because gaming is tempting fate. So instead, we're going to play for wishes." {n}A pile of tiles is placed in front of you and the other players.{/n}

languages.text: “你们可得当心这位大人，小伙子们。{mf|他|她}刚刚答应得太痛快了，我恐怕已经猜到{mf|他|她}这么多的财富是怎么弄来的了。不过我得提醒大家，在艾弗里特，赌钱是一种罪过，因为赌钱就相当于在故意挑战命运。因此，咱们这次不赌钱，赌的是愿望。”{n}婕伊在你和其他玩家面前放好了牌。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Watch out for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, lads. {mf|He|She} was awfully quick to agree just now — I have a sneaking suspicion about how the Rogue Trader acquired all {mf|his|her} countless riches. But I'll warn you now — playing for money is considered wrong on Efreet, because gaming is tempting fate. So instead, we're going to play for wishes." {n}A pile of tiles is placed in front of you and the other players.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你们可得当心这位大人，小伙子们。{mf|他|她}刚刚答应得太痛快了，我恐怕已经猜到{mf|他|她}这么多的财富是怎么弄来的了。不过我得提醒大家，在艾弗里特，赌钱是一种罪过，因为赌钱就相当于在故意挑战命运。因此，咱们这次不赌钱，赌的是愿望。”{n}婕伊在你和其他玩家面前放好了牌。{/n}

languages.text: 「陛下には気をつけなよ、みんな。さっきは、やけに同意するのが早かったもの…自由開拓者がどうやってその数え切れないほどの富を手に入れたのか、ちょっと疑問に思ってるんだ。でも、今から警告しておくよ…イフリートでは金のために遊ぶことは悪いこととされている、賭博は運命を誘惑するものだからね。だから代わりに、願いのために遊びましょ」{n}あなたと他のプレイヤーの前にタイルの山が置かれる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Watch out for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, lads. {mf|He|She} was awfully quick to agree just now — I have a sneaking suspicion about how the Rogue Trader acquired all {mf|his|her} countless riches. But I'll warn you now — playing for money is considered wrong on Efreet, because gaming is tempting fate. So instead, we're going to play for wishes." {n}A pile of tiles is placed in front of you and the other players.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「陛下には気をつけなよ、みんな。さっきは、やけに同意するのが早かったもの…自由開拓者がどうやってその数え切れないほどの富を手に入れたのか、ちょっと疑問に思ってるんだ。でも、今から警告しておくよ…イフリートでは金のために遊ぶことは悪いこととされている、賭博は運命を誘惑するものだからね。だから代わりに、願いのために遊びましょ」{n}あなたと他のプレイヤーの前にタイルの山が置かれる。{/n}

languages.text: «Tened cuidado con mi{mf|lord|lady}, muchachos. Ha aceptado con mucha facilidad y empiezo a tener mis sospechas sobre cómo est{mf|e|a} Comerciante Independiente ha amasado su fortuna. Sin embargo, aviso ya de que jugar por dinero no está permitido en Efreet, puesto que apostar es tentar al destino. Por eso, solo nos jugaremos deseos». {n}Coloca un montón de fichas entre los otros jugadores y tú.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Watch out for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, lads. {mf|He|She} was awfully quick to agree just now — I have a sneaking suspicion about how the Rogue Trader acquired all {mf|his|her} countless riches. But I'll warn you now — playing for money is considered wrong on Efreet, because gaming is tempting fate. So instead, we're going to play for wishes." {n}A pile of tiles is placed in front of you and the other players.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Tened cuidado con mi{mf|lord|lady}, muchachos. Ha aceptado con mucha facilidad y empiezo a tener mis sospechas sobre cómo est{mf|e|a} Comerciante Independiente ha amasado su fortuna. Sin embargo, aviso ya de que jugar por dinero es pecado en Efreet, puesto que apostar es tentar al destino. Por eso, solo nos jugaremos deseos». {n}Coloca un montón de fichas entre los otros jugadores y tú.{/n}

languages.text: « Méfiez-vous de Sa Seigneurie, les amis.{mf|Il|Elle} a donné son accord bien trop vite... Il faut peut-être y voir une indication de la façon dont {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a amassé toutes ses richesses. Mais je préfère vous prévenir : les jeux d'argent sont un crime sur Éfrit, parce qu'en pariant, on tente le diable. C'est pourquoi nous allons plutôt parier des souhaits. » {n}Une pile de tuiles apparaît devant chacun des joueurs, vous y compris.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Watch out for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, lads. {mf|He|She} was awfully quick to agree just now — I have a sneaking suspicion about how the Rogue Trader acquired all {mf|his|her} countless riches. But I'll warn you now — playing for money is considered wrong on Efreet, because gaming is tempting fate. So instead, we're going to play for wishes." {n}A pile of tiles is placed in front of you and the other players.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Méfiez-vous de Sa Seigneurie, les amis. {mf|Il|Elle} a donné son accord bien trop vite... Il faut peut-être y voir une indication de la façon dont {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a amassé toutes ses richesses. Mais je préfère vous prévenir : les jeux d'argent sont un péché sur Éfrit, parce qu'en pariant, on tente le diable. C'est pourquoi nous allons plutôt parier des souhaits. » {n}Une pile de tuiles apparaît devant chacun des joueurs, vous y compris.{/n}

languages.text: "Alle Augen auf {mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft}, Leute. {mf|Er|Sie} hat verdächtig schnell eingewilligt zu spielen – ich habe den leisen Verdacht, wie {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} an {mf|seine|ihre} unzähligen Reichtümer gekommen ist. Aber ich warne Euch direkt – um Geld zu spielen gilt auf Efreet als falsch, da Glücksspiel das Schicksal herausfordert. Stattdessen spielen wir also um Wünsche." {n}Vor dir und den anderen Spielern wird ein Stapel mit Steinen platziert.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Watch out for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, lads. {mf|He|She} was awfully quick to agree just now — I have a sneaking suspicion about how the Rogue Trader acquired all {mf|his|her} countless riches. But I'll warn you now — playing for money is considered wrong on Efreet, because gaming is tempting fate. So instead, we're going to play for wishes." {n}A pile of tiles is placed in front of you and the other players.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Alle Augen auf {mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft}, Leute. {mf|Er|Sie} hat verdächtig schnell eingewilligt zu spielen – ich habe den leisen Verdacht, wie {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} an {mf|seine|ihre} unzähligen Reichtümer gekommen ist. Aber ich warne Euch direkt – um Geld zu spielen gilt auf Efreet als Sünde, da Glücksspiel das Schicksal herausfordert. Stattdessen spielen wir also um Wünsche." {n}Vor dir und den anderen Spielern wird ein Stapel mit Steinen platziert.{/n}

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne dikkat edin çocuklar. Çok hızlı kabul etti. Hür Tacir'in o uçsuz bucaksız hazinelerini nasıl elde ettiğine dair bazı fikirlerim var. Yalnız uyarmış olayım, İfrit'te parasına oynamak yanlış bir şey olarak görülür. Zira oyunlar, belaya davetiye çıkarır. Onun yerine dileğine oynayacağız." {n}Senin ve diğer oyuncuların önüne bir dizi karo dağıtılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Watch out for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, lads. {mf|He|She} was awfully quick to agree just now — I have a sneaking suspicion about how the Rogue Trader acquired all {mf|his|her} countless riches. But I'll warn you now — playing for money is considered wrong on Efreet, because gaming is tempting fate. So instead, we're going to play for wishes." {n}A pile of tiles is placed in front of you and the other players.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne dikkat edin çocuklar. Çok hızlı kabul etti. Hür Tacir'in o uçsuz bucaksız hazinelerini nasıl elde ettiğine dair bazı fikirlerim var. Ama uyarmış olayım, İfrit'te parasına oynamak yanlış bir şey olarak görülür, çünkü oyunlar belaya davetiye çıkarır. Onun yerine dilekler için oynayacağız." {n}Senin ve diğer oyuncuların önüne bir dizi karo dağıtılıyor.{/n}
